title: Portrait of Sir Patrick Inglis, Baronet of Sunnyside

creditline: The William Hood Dunwoody Fund and Gift of funds from Dorothy Record Bauman, Mrs. John Washburn, Mrs. Philip Little, Jr. in memory of her mother, Mrs. Charles J. Martin, and Mrs. Keith Merrill in memory of her husband, Mr. Keith Merrill, by exchange
